comment: He has very helping nature and has  always helped  me in all academic and non academic things .He has always been available. Thank you so much bhaiya for your support and help. Best wishes for your future.
name: Ravi Kumar

comment: Kaafi zaada hardworking banda. Achieved a lot in life. Aur haan bhai Aditi aur ____ same dikhte hain.
name: Prakhar Gautam

comment:
Hey brother, you were the first person I befriended in campus. Thank you for approaching me and opening me up. Tum jaisa yaar na mila to kabhi yaar hi na mila.
A smart, sincere , hardworking,  humble, approachable, helping ....a to z,  you name it, you have it. Always stay the same. Wish you the best
name: Kh. Humendro Singh

comment: One of the most helpful and kindest person I’ve ever met! Supported me in my lowest be it in academics or real life problems. You deserve all the happiness in the world. Will never forget FSZ ki lectures😂😂. Bhagwaan krre BPCL mein bahut tarakki ho and jldi jldi Shaadi ka invitation bhejde.
name: Sreyashi

comment: Baap of heaven, ujjain bhagta rehta h, cricket pakka khelunga, paaji ka bhatija, panner bhurji parcel? Kuch din bache h humare saath me reh lena
name: Rounak Jain

comment: The most matured kiddo I've ever met. Thanks civil god for listening to our prayers- "yaar pass karwa dena bas". Also advance me thanks for future help in civil classes 🤞. 🫂
name: Riya

comment: Group ka Daddy, Isse zyada dedicated and hardworking banda nhi dekha. During the placement season, BPCL just seemed destiny for you. Ab toh PSU mai jaake chill maarna bas😂🙌
name: Sahil Rapartiwar

comment: In the world where toppers are selfish,betrayer,nerd we got a topper who is selfless, faithful,intellectual.passing 4rth year was not possible without him...very supportive..charming...bss last main dhoka de diya kisike chakkar main🥲....ATB bhai
name: Kunwar zeeshan

comment: Ye bhos sahi ka aadmi very dharmik h harbar ujjain chale jata h aur indore aake sojata h 😂. Pure civil ka DADA h bhai apna , jiske bina koi pass ni hota . Graph aur DP chalu rakhna bhai practice chayiye hoti h constant 😂😂. Atb bhai aage k liye 🫂
name: Harsh Parihar

comment:
BTP and best insaan😂🫂
Ujjain enthusiast toh hai jab Mann kre chale jata hai🙃
Thanks bhai padhane ke liye. Tere Karan hi civil nikla hai🥲
Apni itni saari talks aur walks yaad rhengi humesha🫂 Ab sarkari Babu bann kr bhool Mt jana. 
Also stress kam le chill zyada maar. 
Achieve krte reh aise hi🙌
name: Bhavya Singh Thakur

comment: Bhai perfect ho aap Pura civil B.Tech tune paas karvaya hai. Down-to-Earth topper, hardworking aur mera BTP lab-partner. Placement season me dukh baatne ke liye thanks 😏. Bas pata nahi kyu last sem me man nahi lag rha tha padhayi me tera 🌚, but koini you deserved that break. All the best bro !
name: Garvit Gupta

comment: Simping ka level ho ya neechta ka, galiyaan ho ya OTs sab same level ki h bhai apni😂 the most hardworking and focused guy jo same level ka bakchod bhi h.😂 bpcl jake bhulna mat bro or kabhi luu utarwani ho to aa jana 🤣
name: Sarvagya Kanungo

comment:
Respected sir😁 (Group A officer BPCL),
With due respect, I would like to express my sincere gratitude for inspiring me with Ur dedication, punctuality, personality. Ur notes helped me a lot during exams.
Its my pleasure to have a BANIYA (same jaat) friend like u with bundelkhandi excent.
Regards
name: Sanskar Gupta

comment: Without you, B.Tech was impossible. Your bundelkhandi accent is cute and makes normal sentences jokes😂. Sarkari job+bandi+helpful nature+flagship+dimaag=naman. Stay connected buddy🤝

comment:
One of the best guys from our batch. Had some great time with you especially winning the civil conclave and those discussions for solving the assignments. More importantly, itna makhan laga isliye raha ki BPCL me bhi tu meri help karta rahe😂. 
Jokes aside, definitely one my best FRIENDS in college.

comment:
Naman ne 6 mahine dsa karke bpcl me noukri lagva li😂

comment: Nimon! K-pop enthusiast 🤝Trip pe iske jaisa ek banda to hona chahiye sabko control karne ke liye 😂 Bandibaazi thoda kam kar, padhai pe dhyan de😂😂. Good luck for the future bro, milte hai aage😁

comment: Bhai tere bina to civil mushkil hota. Agar 30-31 nahi hota to mera haal bohot alag hota, bohot kuch seekha hai tere se. OG flatmate and gym partner🫡. Kabhi sahi me Ujjain ghoom bhi le, achi jagah hai. All the best bhai, maze kar.

comment:
Apni Sharan me lene ke liye dhanyawaad guruji.
Ye Btech ki naiyaa Paar lagane me aapka bahut bada yogdaan hai aur 1st 2nd mil Jataa to abhi cpi bhi achhi hoti.Exam time ko padhai aur masti ka barabar mishran banake sab ez 😌 Kara diya tune aur meri taang kheechne me to tune bhi koi kasar nhi chhodi.

comment: Apna budelkhandi badde ko ram ram. Apse milke hmare toh bhaag khul gye. Seriously tere jitna well organized and dedicated bnda ni mila mujhe aaj tk. Smartwork mein sbse aage and always there to help. Thanks bhai for all your support as a flatmate and batchmate. Milte rhenge apan toh. TC😊

comment: Bhai iske bhi notes dede yaar..this statement say it all. Balanced life ho to aisi topper bhi hai, bandi bhi hai, smart bhi hai, . aur riya ke naam se mat chidhaya kr, peet dunga agli baar😂.ab to BPCL me bhi partner mil gya hai, maze kariyo 😂.

comment:
Thanks bhai assignment ke liye har sem ke 30 number tu hi dilata h(exc. last sem. obv.).Sweet and bahot humble ldka..Koi bhi chij ho jo samajh na aa rahi ho just call naman...Baaki all the best bhai for future life.
Baaki kuch bkchodi me help chahiye ho to call krdena uske ideas full h.
Stay happy🫂

comment: Most dharmic admi. Bas ujjain Jana hota hai. Mera rr sune ke liye thanks bhai. Mere se jyada DSA seekh kr bpcl chala gaya😂🫠. All the best for future. 7 bje mandir?

comment: Thank you and best of luck for everything bro. Be happy and have fun.
